vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.9;
son of: Reuben (H7205);
brother of: Hanoch (H2585J), Pallu (H6396) and Carmi (H3756)
§ Hezron = "surrounded by a wall"
n pr m
1) a son of Reuben
2) a son of Pharez and grandson of Judah
n pr loc
3) a place in the extreme south of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Rubén; (b)   hijo de Fares; tribu de Judá; (c)   lugar; territorio de Judá; (d) קְרִיּוֹת חֶצְרוֹן ,חָצוֹר   ciudad; territorio de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希斯崙 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "被牆圍住"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 流便的一個兒子
2) 法勒斯的兒子, 猶大的孫子
專有名詞 地名
3) 猶大極南端之地 #書 15:3|
4) 猶大南方的另一座城 #書 15:25|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希斯仑 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "被墙围住"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 流便的一个儿子
2) 法勒斯的儿子, 犹大的孙子
专有名词 地名
3) 犹大极南端之地 #书 15:3|
4) 犹大南方的另一座城 #书 15:25|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.12;
son of: Perez (H6557);
brother of: Hamul (H2538); married to daughter_of_Machir (H4353I) and Abiah (H0029J);
father of: Ram (H7410), Jerahmeel (H3396), Caleb (H3612H), Segub (H7687H) and Ashhur (H0806)
§ Hezron = "surrounded by a wall"
n pr m
1) a son of Reuben
2) a son of Pharez and grandson of Judah
n pr loc
3) a place in the extreme south of Judah
